title: Overlay image on Leaflet feature
body: I'm looking for a way to overlay an image on a rectangle geoJson feature within a leaflet. The image should be rotated and resized to fit inside the feature at all times and regardless of if the user zooms or not. I have already looked at the Leaflet.ImageOverlay.Rotated plugin which doesn't seem to work, it does about the same as the base image ImageOverlay and places the image behind the feature, sticking out of the sides.
